title: TDR - Trade Duty Refund | Ian Crauwel's Profile
description: Check Ian's details and schedule a chat to find out how much TDR can make you save on your reverse logistics budget.
bio: With a robust background in logistics management, customs processes, and e-commerce, Ian brings a wealth of experience and expertise to the table.
skills: <ul class="interline"><li><strong>Customs and Trade Compliance</strong>: Ian has a deep understanding of global customs processes and trade compliance, which is essential for navigating the complexities of cross-border e-commerce.</li><li><strong>Cross-Border eCommerce</strong>: With experience in building and managing cross-border e-commerce solutions, Ian is well-equipped to handle the unique challenges of international online retail.</li><li><strong>Technical Processes</strong>: His technical acumen allows him to integrate and optimize customs processes within e-commerce platforms effectively.</li></ul>
